description: An iconic Italian classic about the joyful dream of flying through a blue sky.

songName: What Kind Of Fool Am I

A jubilant, show-stopping welcome to a beloved character's triumphant return.

songName: The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face

songName: What's Love Got To Do With It
